description:
After getting stranded at Thriller Bark, Chopper, Nami, and Usopp are chased by a three headed beast. Back on the boat, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats are terrorized by an unseen enemy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kai Genshou Zokuzoku! Thriller Bark Jouriku
Les phénomènes étranges se succèdent ! Débarquement à Thriller Bark
One Unnatural Phenomenon After the Next! Disembarking on Thriller Bark!
Загадка за загадкой! Высадка на Триллер Барк
ظاهرة غير طبيعيّة تلو الأخرى! النّزل إلى ثريلر بارك
怪現象ぞくぞく! スリラーバーク上陸
